episodes.synopsis: With a German invasion a virtual certainty, islanders rush to secure spots on the few boats leaving for England. For three families, time runs out.
episodes.title: Eve of the War

episodes.synopsis: Cassies refuses to sell to the German soldiers until Lt. Walker pays a visit. Angelique and June reopen the shop abandoned by their father's friend.
episodes.title: Living with the Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Now stuck on the island, Philip and Eugene hide out in Wilf and Kathleen's barn, which is repeatedly searched. Sheldon moves to a new hiding place.
episodes.title: To Catch a Spy

episodes.synopsis: Horrified that his scheme to save Eugene failed, James askes the Baron to take his life instead. Philip, continues to pose as the Dorr's gardener.
episodes.title: Strange Mercies

episodes.synopsis: Walker, who's obsessed with Zelda, is in charge of removing Jews from the island. He learns her secret, but she goes into hiding.
episodes.title: Unexpected Revelations

episodes.synopsis: June continues to sing for the Germans at the 50/50 Club, causing a local man to accuse her of sleeping with the enemy.
episodes.title: Unusual Successes

video.title: Island at War
video.synopsis: Set on a fictional slice of the Channel Islands, this engrossing series follows three families caught on the islands at the beginning of World War II, capturing their experiences as they grapple with the stress of daily life and global conflict.
